alert.note: Alert for Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet; South and East Jackson, Larimer, North and Northeast Grand, Northwest Boulder Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 29 at 8:41PM MST until December 30 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 11 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts to 75 mph possible. The strongest winds are expected to be between 8 am and 5 pm. * WHERE...Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet and South and East Jackson/Larimer/North and Northeast Grand/Northwest Boulder Counties Above 9000 Feet Counties. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 11 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet; South and East Jackson, Larimer, North and Northeast Grand, Northwest Boulder Counties Above 9000 Feet
